animeTitle: Arslan Senki (TV): Tsuioku no Shou - Dakkan no Yaiba
animeDescription: Arslan Senki (TV): Dakkan no Yaiba retells the events of the series' first 13 episodes, summarizing the events that transpired from Arslan's escape with Daryun, to their time in the Peshawar Citadel.
